name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.openAi
semantic_context: Message an assistant or GPT, analyze images, generate audio, etc.

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Message a Model
options.description: Create a completion with GPT 3, 4, etc.

options.name: Classify Text for Violations
options.description: Check whether content complies with usage policies

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the assistant. The maximum length is 256 characters.
name.ai_hint: The name of the assistant. The maximum length is 256 characters.

description.name: description
description.description: The description of the assistant. The maximum length is 512 characters.
description.ai_hint: The description of the assistant. The maximum length is 512 characters.

instructions.name: instructions
instructions.description: The system instructions that the assistant uses. The maximum length is 32768 characters.
instructions.ai_hint: The system instructions that the assistant uses. The maximum length is 32768 characters.

codeInterpreter.name: codeInterpreter
codeInterpreter.description: Whether to enable the code interpreter that allows the assistants to write and run Python code in a sandboxed execution environment, find more here

knowledgeRetrieval.name: knowledgeRetrieval
knowledgeRetrieval.description: Whether to augments the assistant with knowledge from outside its model, such as proprietary product information or documents, find more here

file_ids.name: file_ids
file_ids.description: The files to be used by the assistant, there can be a maximum of 20 files attached to the assistant
file_ids.hint: Add more files by using the 'Upload a File' operation
file_ids.ai_hint: The files to be used by the assistant, there can be a maximum of 20 files attached to the assistant

noticeTools.displayName: Connect your own custom n8n tools to this node on the canvas
noticeTools.name: noticeTools

options.name: options
frequency_penalty
options.description: Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim

options.name: maxTokens
options.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion. Most models have a context length of 2048 tokens (except for the newest models, which support 32,768).

options.name: n
options.description: How many completions to generate for each prompt. Note: Because this parameter generates many completions, it can quickly consume your token quota. Use carefully and ensure that you have reasonable settings for max_tokens and stop.

options.name: presence_penalty
options.description: Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics

options.name: temperature
options.description: Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.

options.name: topP
options.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, controls diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.

options.name: reasoning_effort
options.description: Controls the amount of reasoning tokens to use. A value of "low" will favor speed and economical token usage, "high" will favor more complete reasoning at the cost of more tokens generated and slower responses.

options.name: Low
options.description: Favors speed and economical token usage

options.name: Medium
options.description: Balance between speed and reasoning accuracy

options.name: High
options.description: Favors more complete reasoning at the cost of more tokens generated and slower responses

options.name: maxToolsIterations
options.description: The maximum number of tool iteration cycles the LLM will run before stopping. A single iteration can contain multiple tool calls. Set to 0 for no limit.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

assistantId.name: assistantId
assistantId.description: Assistant to respond to the message. You can add, modify or remove assistants in the playground.
assistantId.ai_hint: Assistant to respond to the message. You can add, modify or remove assistants in the playground.

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.placeholder: e.g. A cute cat eating a dinosaur
prompt.description: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters for dall-e-2 and 4000 characters for dall-e-3.
prompt.ai_hint: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters for dall-e-2 and 4000 characters for dall-e-3.

memory.name: memory

options.name: Use memory connector
options.description: Connect one of the supported memory nodes

options.name: Use thread ID
options.description: Specify the ID of the thread to continue

memory.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

threadId.name: threadId
threadId.description: The ID of the thread to continue, a new thread will be created if not specified
threadId.hint: If the thread ID is empty or undefined a new thread will be created and included in the response
threadId.ai_hint: The ID of the thread to continue, a new thread will be created if not specified

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

fileSizeLimitNotice.displayName: OpenAI API limits the size of the audio file to 25 MB
fileSizeLimitNotice.name: fileSizeLimitNotice

model.name: model
model.description: The model to use for image generation
model.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

input.name: input
input.description: The input text to classify if it is violates the moderation policy
input.ai_hint: The input text to classify if it is violates the moderation policy

voice.name: voice
voice.description: The voice to use when generating the audio
voice.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be processed
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the image(s)
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary property which contains the image(s)

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

messages.name: messages

values.name: content
values.description: The content of the message to be send
values.placeholder: e.g. Hello, how can you help me?

values.name: role
values.description: Role in shaping the model's response, it tells the model how it should behave and interact with the user

options.name: User
options.description: Send a message as a user and get a response from the model

options.name: Assistant
options.description: Tell the model to adopt a specific tone or personality

options.name: System
options.description: Usually used to set the model's behavior or context for the next user message

messages.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput
jsonOutput.description: Whether to attempt to return the response in JSON format. Compatible with GPT-4 Turbo and all GPT-3.5 Turbo models newer than gpt-3.5-turbo-1106.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'instructions'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'codeInterpreter'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'knowledgeRetrieval'
IF codeInterpreter == True AND operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'file_ids'
IF knowledgeRetrieval == True THEN HIDE parameter 'file_ids'
IF knowledgeRetrieval == True AND operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'file_ids'
IF codeInterpreter == True THEN HIDE parameter 'file_ids'
IF knowledgeRetrieval == True AND codeInterpreter == True AND operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'file_ids'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticeTools'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'deleteAssistant' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'assistantId'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'assistantId'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF prompt == 'define' AND operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.6}} AND operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'memory'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.6}} AND memory == 'threadId' AND operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'threadId'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticeTools'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.8}} THEN HIDE parameter 'baseURL'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'preserveOriginalTools'
IF operation == 'list' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'assistantId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'assistant' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'audio' AND operation IN ["translate", "transcribe"] THEN SHOW parameter 'fileSizeLimitNotice'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'model'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'input'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'voice'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'translate' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'translate' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'deleteFile' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'list' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'model'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /model == 'dall-e-2' THEN SHOW parameter 'n'
IF /model == 'dall-e-3' THEN SHOW parameter 'dalleQuality'
IF /model == 'gpt-image-1' THEN SHOW parameter 'quality'
IF /model == 'dall-e-2' THEN SHOW parameter 'size'
IF /model == 'dall-e-3' THEN SHOW parameter 'size'
IF /model == 'gpt-image-1' THEN SHOW parameter 'size'
IF /model == 'dall-e-3' THEN SHOW parameter 'style'
IF /model == 'gpt-image-1' THEN HIDE parameter 'returnImageUrls'
IF returnImageUrls == False THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyOutput'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.4}} AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'imageUrls'
IF inputType == 'base64' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'classify' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'input'
IF operation == 'classify' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'classify' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'messages'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'

IF modelId IN ["gpt-3.5-turbo-16k-0613", "dall-e-3", "text-embedding-3-large", "dall-e-2", "whisper-1", "tts-1-hd-1106", "tts-1-hd", "gpt-4-0314", "text-embedding-3-small", "gpt-4-32k-0314", "gpt-3.5-turbo-0301", "gpt-4-vision-preview", "gpt-3.5-turbo-16k", "gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct-0914", "tts-1", "davinci-002", "gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct", "babbage-002", "tts-1-1106", "text-embedding-ada-002"] AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.2}} AND operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'hideTools'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticeTools'
IF hideTools == 'hide' THEN HIDE parameter 'noticeTools'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /modelId == {'_cnd': {'regex': '(^o1([-\\d]+)?$)|(^o[3-9].*)|(^gpt-5.*)'}} THEN SHOW parameter 'reasoning_effort'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.5}} THEN SHOW parameter 'maxToolsIterations'
